In three sentences
Comments
There is a police station on campus, parking lot patrol officers, and random security around campus.
There are so many options for Greek Life, but since I'm not Greek I don't want to steer you in the wrong direction. I know plenty of Chi Omega girls and they really seem to enjoy Greek Life.
ASC - Academic Success Center The Writing Center DSU - DiGiorgio Student Union WU Crew - Student Section for Athletics the list goes on and on
artsy athletic educators
There are many places on campus that were built in honor of important people. Strom Thurmond inspired the Thurmond Building and many of Winthrop's leaders had buildings named in their honor as well.

There are always fun events at the DIGS campus center. The theater department is almost always putting on a show. And, the campus arranges shuttles to and from downtown for students convenience to athletic events and other activities.
Winthrop has some of the best selections of food available. I never had to leave campus during the day.
I am a commuter student so I've only been in a few dorms, but they have all been nice.
Be prepared! The work is hard, but not overbearing. Have fun! The professors are all laid back so there is no need to be nervous.

Winthrop University's campus is beautiful and peaceful. The professor's are all very knowledgeable on the subjects they teach, and easy to get along with which is a plus. This is a great place for first time college students to learn and gain responsibility.
pageTitle: Winthrop University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: I have never had better relationships with teachers as I have had in my first two semesters here. Am learning a lot I never thought I'd learn so much pursuing a Computer Science degree from a liberal arts college. The classes are small so you receive individual attention from teachers who really care, and are more than willing to meet with you after class to help you with anything. Login to rate or flag the reviews Nontombe from Columbia, SC 08/17/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 15 out of 16 people found this review useful. 3 of 122 Categories Comments Great for these types of students This school seems to be mainly based on those who want to go in to the teaching field. So if you think education is going to be your area of expertise, then Winthrop is definitely the choice you need to make. Tips for prospective students
